idea-plugin.name: ShowRuntimeClass
idea-plugin.description:
The purpose of this plugin was to enable developers to view class files in the JVM memory while learning about the bytecode framework. If you find the plugin useful, please give it a good rating! Your approval is the driving force behind its updates.
